title: Historic Old Dhaka Walking Tour
description: Explore the vibrant streets and hidden gems of Old Dhaka, the historical heart of Bangladesh. Discover 400 years of history through Mughal architecture, bustling markets, and authentic street food.
itinerary: Start at Lalbagh Fort (10 AM) → Visit Ahsan Manzil (Pink Palace) → Explore Sadarghat River Port → Old Dhaka street food tasting → Star Mosque visit → Local market exploration → End at Shakhari Bazar (3 PM)
meetingPoint: Lalbagh Fort main gate, Old Dhaka

title: Sundarbans Mangrove Forest Adventure
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the world's largest mangrove forest. Spot Royal Bengal Tigers, cruise through mysterious waterways, and experience unique biodiversity.
itinerary:
Day 1: Khulna arrival → Boat cruise to Karamjal → Crocodile breeding center → Evening cultural show
Day 2: Early morning jungle trek → Wildlife spotting → Visit fisherman villages → Night stay at forest camp
Day 3: Bird watching → Return to Khulna

title: Cox's Bazar Beach Sunrise & Local Life
description: Experience the world's longest natural sea beach at sunrise, followed by immersion in local fishing communities and traditional seafood cuisine.
itinerary: 5:30 AM: Sunrise at Laboni Point → Beach walking (2 hours) → Visit fishing harbor → Local breakfast at Himchori → Traditional fishing boat experience → Local market visit → Seafood cooking demo → End at 2 PM

title: Sylhet Tea Garden & Waterfall Discovery
description: Wander through endless tea gardens, visit historic tea factories, and discover stunning waterfalls in the picturesque hills of Sylhet.
itinerary: 8 AM: Malnichara Tea Garden tour → Tea tasting session → Visit 150-year-old tea factory → Lunch at local restaurant → Ratargul Swamp Forest boat ride → Bisnakandi waterfall visit → Return by 6 PM

title: Dhaka Street Food Crawl
description: A culinary adventure through Dhaka's most famous street food spots. Taste authentic Bengali snacks, sweets, and local delicacies with a food expert.
itinerary: 6 PM: Start at Nilkhet → Fuchka/panipuri tasting → Chotpoti and jhalmuri experience → Traditional biryani stop → Kebab and paratha tasting → Roshogolla and mishti doi (sweets) → Local tea/coffee → End at 9:30 PM

title: Rangamati Hill Tracts & Tribal Culture
description: Immerse yourself in the rich tribal culture of the Chittagong Hill Tracts. Visit indigenous communities, cruise on Kaptai Lake, and learn traditional crafts.
itinerary:
Day 1: Arrival in Rangamati → Kaptai Lake boat cruise → Visit tribal villages → Traditional lunch → Buddhist temple visit
Day 2: Handicraft market → Tribal museum → Traditional weaving demonstration → Cultural performance → Return

title: Srimangal: Land of Two Leaves & a Bud
description: Explore Bangladesh's tea capital. Visit organic tea gardens, learn tea processing, and experience the unique culture of tea plantation workers.
itinerary: 7 AM: Lawachara Rainforest trek → Spot hoolock gibbons → Organic tea garden visit → Tea plucking experience → Tea factory tour and tasting → Seven-layer tea experience → Tribal village visit → Return by 5 PM

title: Dhaka Rickshaw Art & Craft Tour
description: Discover the vibrant world of Bangladeshi rickshaw art. Meet artists, visit workshops, and learn about this unique folk art tradition.
itinerary: 10 AM: Start at New Market → Visit rickshaw painting workshops → Meet traditional artists → Rickshaw decoration demonstration → Art materials market → Create your own rickshaw art souvenir → Rickshaw ride through old city → End at 2 PM

title: Saint Martin's Island Coral & Marine Life
description: Explore Bangladesh's only coral island. Snorkel in crystal clear waters, discover marine life, and experience island culture.
itinerary:
Day 1: Boat to Saint Martin's → Check-in → Beach exploration → Sunset viewing
Day 2: Morning snorkeling → Coral reef exploration → Local fishing village visit → Seafood BBQ lunch → Island cycling
Day 3: Sunrise at Chera Dwip → Return to mainland

title: Paharpur Buddhist Monastery Archaeological Tour
description: Step back in time at the largest Buddhist monastery south of the Himalayas. Explore ancient ruins and learn about Bengal's rich Buddhist heritage.
itinerary: 8 AM: Start at Paharpur → Main temple complex exploration → Museum visit → Terracotta artwork study → Meditation at ancient site → Local lunch → Visit nearby Jain temple → Return by 4 PM
